mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKOUT (workout_id, workout_img, workout_title, workout_link, workout_content) VALUE(WORKOUT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{workout_img}, #{workout_title}, #{workout_link}, #{workout_content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workout ORDER BY workout_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE workout SET workout_img = #{workout_img}, workout_title = #{workout_title}, workout_link = #{workout_link}, workout_content = #{workout_content}
